body:
Whenever I try to move sentences down lines (Enter Key) in my profile page "About" it always seem to register as a space bar and stays on the same line.

Anyone else have this problem and how do I fix?
body_tagged:

title: Why does this happen?

replies.body: Use <br> to move down a line.
replies.body_tagged: Use <br> to move down a line.

replies.body:
Use <br> each time you want to start a new line. It's very simple.

Example:
Hi!<br>My name is Ben and I'm from Australia.<br>c:

Will output:
Hi!
My name is Ben and I'm from Australia.
c:
